title: Sativa Studio Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Organic, Western, Juice bar, Take-out, Afro Caribbean
description: Colorfully decorated vegetarian restaurant offering dishes like tamales, vegan burger, and plaintain. Beverages include organic coffee, herbal tea, and probiotic drinks. Has an attached pottery studio.
streetAddress: Calle Luis A Martinez y Eloy Alfaro St, Correo Central
